website_summaries.verdict: An incredible buy for the money, especially considering it's Kodak. Sleek and pocket-friendly.
pros: Utilizes latest in Digital Light Processing technology for clear, bright images
Wireless connection to smartphones and tablets
LED has an estimated life of 30,000 hours
cons: Streaming experience isn't as consistent as it could be

customer_reviews.title: It works great for cookie decorating.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for cookie decorating so it is only a couple of feet (or less) away from the table and works great. It does not have to be far from the table to give a sharp image. There are a lot of "cookiers" out there that need this info. I could not find in the specifications how close you could get it to the wall or table to get a clear image..... that would help this group of people out a lot. :) Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Miss A

customer_reviews.title: Great for artist painters
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for painting watercolors and acrylics. I blowup an image on my phone or ipad to do a tracing. The image can be as small or as large as you like, but your image will eventually degrade beyond about 70 inches. This Kodak really delivered accurate detail and color. I am so happy with this device for my purposes. Be sure you purchase the right kind of projector for pictures: DLP Texas Instruments (copyright). Some sellers are claiming to have DLP in a projector, but you really have to check that the proper logo appears on the device. I tried one other, the Apeman, and it didn't compare for image quality, sharpness and color accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: ot
customer_reviews.text: it requires an additional app to watch netflix and hulu and amazon movies. it will present the smart view from your phone and mirror your phone all the way down to selecting the movie then once you select play the picture disappears and you only have audio of the movie. so frustrating and also the power cord is extrememly short. wast of time to order this
customer_reviews.author: jcd

customer_reviews.title: Not liking it
customer_reviews.text: This projector has the worst possible speakers, you really can’t hear anything coming out of them, you will have to attach external speakers to it. Also not a huge range projector, it has to be very near the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Al

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny that this item forces you to rate it for picture, brightness, and portability when the Biggest issue is that **the projector simply does not work**. It turns off erratically, fails to stay charged even when plugged in, and if you should get so lucky as to have it work for 15 minutes you’ll be met with a overheated notification followed by “Temperature anomaly.” So disappointed In this product.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Berlincourt

customer_reviews.title: not as great as they say...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be a great projector for my work. 1, I should have checked for keystone adjustment...this was the WORST to finagle into a perfect rectangle. It's tiny, which was fabulous. It's not as bright as I would need to use for a presentation, and is also not as clear with any kind of illumination in the room. I wouldn't purchase this again...in fact, I may actually purchase something cheaper. I wanted to love this so badly...I can't. Sad
customer_reviews.author: azaleasmom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Can't stream movies from phone.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the sleek compact design and the picture quality. But not easy to stream videos like Netflix, hulu, prime, YouTube videos. Only sound and a blank white screen. Good for art making to trace a sketch or a picture onto a big area.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: small and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect, love the ability to use micro SD for movies, screen mirroring from iphone is smooth. Sample picture is on a black background so color is a little washed out. At large screen sizes, up to 50 inch or so, brightness is still good, however ambient light has to be controlled, normal indoor lighting doesn't hurt too bad.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Free movie time at home
customer_reviews.text: As you can see this little lightweight projector fits in the palm of my hand, making it super simple to take with you anywhere - in your purse, backpack, briefcase or anything. It is great for home or office use. Ours if the highlight of our camping trips. Throw a sheet up and instant movie time. Has built in speaker and can produce image to 150”. Also adapts to HDMI,USB,Micro as, along with being aero play and miracast enabled. Never a boring or dull moment with this item. Simple plug and play, and the picture quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun in small package. All you need.
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at how easy this is to use. Just place it on a stable surface hooked up to your iphone and watch anything on almost any light color surface. We’ve watched everything from Netflix, Amazon Video, you tube and home videos on the wall, a flat curtain or sheet, large paper, cutting board (don’t ask) , even the ceiling. Buy it. You could use this instead of having a huge big screen TV and be pretty happy. The image quality is great. Bought the 150 version and am thrilled 100%.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reveal

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This tiny projector is a great addition to my gaming room/office. I attach a cable to my laptop and I can split screen twitch streams or lowfi study music streams while I game on PC or tv. It's such a good third screen. Sound quality is...... There's much to be desired. Haven't tried connecting a Bluetooth to it yet. I don't use a screen, I just product onto my white textured walls and watch YouTube videos. Not bad for background entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: carmen caraway

customer_reviews.title: I Bought This for One Reason
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to project images... It's a good thing because if your wanting to use it for Airplay... Forget it. I updated everything manually and online. I was able to connect the device to my wifi router but any time I tried to airplay anything... Nothing. Picture quality and brightness were surprisingly good but the apps are garbage and good luck trying to play movies from Amazon, or iTunes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, not the greatest picture quality, Missing foot.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but don't expect the best picture quality. It vaguely claims to be '1080p' but that probably means that it can accept a 1080p signal, the native resolution very obviously lower. Ours arrived with one of the four small white rubber feet missing. This is very annoying, but not worth the hassle of a return.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: It's shiny you know you want it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this Kodak Luma 150 pocket projector to decorate cookies. It's a great replacement for my Pico projector. Biggest PRO is being able to now screen mirror so I have way less cords in the way. As a cookie decorator you must know how great that is!!! Other than still trying to find a stand that works well for me I haven't really run into any hiccups. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia T

customer_reviews.title: Cannot stream with this device
customer_reviews.text: The product was compact and I was happy to support Kodak, however it did not meet my needs. PROS: Attractive and compact, fair price, image quality was good at about 30", decent audio CONS: Difficult to connect with iPhone, Once connected, connection is unstable, Most important: does not support streaming (Netflix, Prime, etc.). I called Kodak CS and they stated this was due to copyright (??)
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play with great picture
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for work and I am very happy with it. Have projected my PPT presentations onto semi-dark wall with great detail. Text, graphics, and flow are fantastic both via HDMI and wireless connection. Truly just charged it up, turned it on, and plugged it into my laptop. Great picture on my wall. I really like to tripod mount on the bottom as well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Limited sound capability and charge duration
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was great Sound will probably work well in a conference room or small viewing area Full charge may get you thru a 1.5hr movie. We had to have an 'intermission' to recharge and resume play. Bought for social distancing movie interaction and it worked well enough. Not techie enough to figure out if you can hook up to a blue tooth speaker while using HDMI feed of iPhone Size is great for portability Viewed movie as a ~8' 16x9 outside on a bed sheet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for your buck and it works
customer_reviews.text: Very Satisfied I had another projector did lots of research my friend begged me to sell it to him I got this one and I’m happy I did overall a much better portable projector shipment arrived well packed and in a timely manner. I suggest you get this for the price it’s great. I don’t like that it didn’t bring a protective case but a lot of them don’t still gets a 5 star. Battery life is great. It’s an awesome buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Projects clear small and large pictures
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for projecting large or small pictures. It gives a clear small picture, such as a 5x10 which most projectors wont do. I download pics onto a thumb drive and use that in the projector. I haven't used it for movies so i dont know how it works for that.
customer_reviews.author: L. Samples

customer_reviews.title: Best pick projector for cookies and everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several portable projectors and returned them. This was the easiest to set up, literally took 5 minutes, and is perfect on a mount. You can't beat the brand name either. I'd recommend this to anybody! I'm a cookie decorator and this makes letting on cookue so easy.
customer_reviews.author: George Darmetko

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After a few failed mini projector attempts this one is easy to use, easy to store and easy to set up. I use my fire stick and have movie night with the kids all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: Denice S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR NETFLIX OR HULU
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fine and easy to work but you can’t connect to Hulu or Netflix or anything to watch movies please don’t spend ur money
customer_reviews.author: Essence Clerkley

customer_reviews.title: Small, good image quality, can focus even from very short distance from wall
customer_reviews.text: Projector is bright in a darkened room, can see image well with a lamp on in the room at night. Best thing is it has a good quality picture and it can clearly focus (image and text) from a short distance away from the wall or whatever surface you are projecting onto. It can focus from about 6" away (screen size is gonna be small at this distance) so if youre limited on space like me, this is a great choice for a nice screen size and image quality without having to be 4-5 feet away or taking up too much space with a bulky and expensive short throw projector.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portability.  Works best in dark, dark rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Very small and portable. Inherent weakness is dimmer than full size projectors. The truck is obviously to control ambient light. Resolution is good and connection/operation is crazy easy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Love it just WiFi and battery
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing...very portable...easy to use just can’t get the WiFi to work? Also battery doesn’t last 2.5 hrs...was watching a movie and it only last 1hr...I was sure I fully charged it...
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home, work and school.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love that it connects so easily to my phone and computer. It’s so portable, but It can project a pretty large screen. Love that there is the hdmi option, as well as SD.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Has some things that need to be improved that’ll make this device pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I love how portable it is! I am however a little disappointed about the picture quality. It could be a little brighter, and I can’t get the fine print to be super clear. I get that it’s a projector, but would think that for $200 you would have a pretty good projector. I also don’t like how I cant connect to my Bluetooth headphones or speaker while I’m connected wirelessly to the projector. If there’s anything that could be improved on this device it would probably be the things I just listed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality, very easy to use very easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector! I needed something small and easy to move around and could play all the movies/shows apps I needed to use with easy from my phone without to little use of adapter. Great picture quality and brightness and the adjust of the screen distance size picture still comes out great. I’m a preschool teacher so it’s very easy to set up and take down it plays my education videos and I can have fun special movie days! Give a update after I have it for a little longer. But so far great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good all around projecter
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when using the wireless feature the video can get slightly choppy. Also you cannot use it to projector movies off of Netflix or amazon prime video unless you hook up a Apple TV type of device
customer_reviews.author: Say What

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: Cute and compact projector bought for use during outdoor movie nights. Pros- size, ease of use. Cons- volume, even with the help of an additional speaker. Overall- love it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kri10

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work ok if wireless
customer_reviews.text: What's the point if you can't make it work when it's wireless? It'll work very good when you have it connected to the wall, otherwise, it doesn't work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great answer to watching shows in bed
customer_reviews.text: Great size and big delivery. Wish came with tripod. Setting up is most difficult to do when trying to get in correct spot.
customer_reviews.author: groovy girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but ...
customer_reviews.text: For the life of me I could not figure out how to wirelessly connect to this projector from a desktop computer. It seems that the only way to connect is through a third-party casting app which is only available on phones.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: For Apple purchase the Lightning Digital AV Adapter!
customer_reviews.text: Art murals from my photographs for my friends and family. It is perfect also for presentations. It is itty bitty and perfect. For Apple just need the AV Cable. Anyone at an Apple Store can help you. This info is also in the manual - take it with you to Apple. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bdabb

customer_reviews.title: Great Father’s Day gift
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far! I got it for Father’s Day and have watched a couple movies outside and it worked really nice. The setup was quite easy and the resolution quality was amazing. Definitely worth the money:
customer_reviews.author: A. Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Weak brightness but cool
customer_reviews.text: Resolution is not bad but cannot use this at daytime. It has really weak brightness.. Cool projector for night time movie.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baek

customer_reviews.title: Not for movie night
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad projector to use with Apple products to simply play a movie or from Netflix. Took up to three hours and 5 adults to set up. Ridiculous. This should Only be used for presentations and not for a back yard movie night. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Eldred

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little projector. Came promptly, packaged okay, totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie the Reader

customer_reviews.title: Power off all the time
customer_reviews.text: Why always power off by itself when the charger line connecting
customer_reviews.author: Jing Jing

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little projector. We got it to have something fun to do while locked down at home.
customer_reviews.author: Sara McNally

customer_reviews.title: Handy but the picture quality is not so good as mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Handy Easy Install Cons: Picture quality Sound quality Not worth for the price. Wireless mirroring wont work at all need to buy google chrome cast or any casting devices to play on this device.
customer_reviews.author: kranthi Kumar Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size but not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and ease of use but you need a fairly dark room to get a good image display.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Slightly more difficult to set up than we expected, but overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wegner

customer_reviews.title: Nice pocket size projector.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. You can put in you pocket. And the display also pretty good for that size projector.
customer_reviews.author: sean_chen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This projector exceeded all of my expectations. Incredibly portable, easy to set up, and easy to use. Additionally, it was actually packaged very well by the seller and arrived undamaged by the normal shipping processes, which is such a rarity these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and fun
customer_reviews.text: Super fun. Connect your Chromecast or switch for outdoor movies and games. It's so compact, I can take it anywhere. Also it runs on battery for around 2hours so you can be cord free!
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Such a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to take this pocket projector with me everywhere that I go because it allows me to watch anywhere. Connecting to it is a breeze and I love watching movies off of it because it looks great on my wall and I am happy with the sounds, too. This was such a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability. Easy to use one you buy extra attachment depending on your phone but battery doesn't last as long as says.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Burton

customer_reviews.title: Pocket theater!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little awkward to connect with a couple of different things but all in all it has worked with everything that I own the picture quality is excellent, and the sound is fantastic for how small it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First when i try at home its kinda little bit not happy on it, but when i try one time when we did camping at night i was amazed how clear it is. definitely worth buying for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Sombillo

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: The batter life of the projector is too short. The description says it can last up to 2.5hr, but I can’t even finish watching a 2 hour movie with it. Besides this, I like how portable it is, and the picture quality is pretty good considering its price.
customer_reviews.author: Lu_syz

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend using this to show a movie for a movie night party, which is why I purchased this. The battery doesn’t last long enough. Maybe a slide show with pictures, but that’s about it. Nothing great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else to ask for!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by the resolution quality and size of the picture even in daylight Its portable pocket size having features like wifi SD card USB HDMI connections. What else can I ask for
customer_reviews.author: Abeer

customer_reviews.title: It's awful
customer_reviews.text: No way to set, the black doesn't exist, everything is light grey
customer_reviews.author: Pita S.

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector! It’s so portable and easy to use. I could not get Netflix or Hulu to work using my iPhone or iPad and that was disappointing. We ended up connecting the chrome cast to stream movies.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Froestad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very portable
customer_reviews.text: Very little setup for lap top use. The projector worked as soon as I plugged the HDMI plug into my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite there
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this little gadget. And I still carry it around like I’m going to use it. But it just can’t ever get bright enough or in focus enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good projector for its size
customer_reviews.text: It's great for its size. Decent picture quality and brightness. The only minus is that it connects via wi-fi (it kind of creates its own hotspot) so it's difficult to connect to the internet afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Buzila

customer_reviews.title: I hate it
customer_reviews.text: I hate the fact that you can’t charge it while it’s on. Who in their right mind though that it would be a good idea to make it where you can’t charge it while it’s on. What sense does that make.
customer_reviews.author: joffre munoz

customer_reviews.title: ALL STREAMING CONTENT BLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: All content for streaming is blocked. No Netflix, no purchased items, nothing. It’s great except useless!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected.. pixel doesn’t get very large, pixels are bad. Doesn’t get to mirror unless directly attached to laptop. Returning today.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my wife. We have been doing movie nights.
customer_reviews.author: B.N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got it used And it's been great. It's made quarantine a lot more fun! The screen mirroring is a little weird but it works perfect with my mac.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Can connect to it in a number of different ways
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice how you are able to connect to this pocket projector in a number of different ways that way you will always be able to figure out a way to connect to it.
customer_reviews.author: Davidson R

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good! haven't been able to mirror my iPhone to it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan R.

customer_reviews.title: No charger
customer_reviews.text: The projector does has to be charged for 3 hours to work yet it does not come with a charger. It comes with the cable but no docking station. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: kyle l mcclard

customer_reviews.title: No need to have a big TV anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love how I no longer need to worry about having a big TV at home when I can have this little projector that gets the job done even better!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: good for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: does not work with cell phone. HDMI is the best bet
customer_reviews.author: alex oselu owiti

customer_reviews.title: Would love to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the size and picture quality. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the quality of the projection
customer_reviews.text: Every single time that I have watched a move with this projector, I have been very impressed with how the images looked on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Husain Pye

customer_reviews.title: Projects movies in high quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that something so little is able to work so powerfully. Indeed, it is able to project movies in such high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PROJECTOR
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector! It’s super small and perfect to take anywhere. The picture quality is great. Can’t wait to take it on my next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Has come in handy so many times
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is for me to carry around this projector from one place to another because it has come in handy so many times.
customer_reviews.author: Myrvyn

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to worry about carrying a speaker
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice how this pocket projector even comes with a speaker that way I don't have to worry about carrying one around with me.
customer_reviews.author: John Conneely

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product unless your trying to do a slideshow
customer_reviews.text: Patchy quality, can’t play video well. Shuts down fast. Brightness is low and it does not connect well to Bluetooth. amazon Fire/Crome/ stick does not work well. HDMI doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Logancabral

customer_reviews.title: Comes at a really great price
customer_reviews.text: This pocket projector comes at a really great price considering that my movies get displayed in high quality and onto a big wall.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gary

customer_reviews.title: High quality low on price
customer_reviews.text: High quality low on price. Great buy for a compact projector.
customer_reviews.author: Chiz1906

customer_reviews.title: I love having it
customer_reviews.text: I love having this mini projector around because it provides me with a movie theater style movie watching experience.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Albert

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to present at any time. No big equipment, no hassle
customer_reviews.text: Very small and compact. Perfect for tucking in a briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working already
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for Christmas and already it has stopped working. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality picture/short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I like everything accept the battery life sucks! But the picture is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but best used in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL RUSS

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is horrible. Runs out quickly. Turns off even though its connected to the charger. HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Kick stand
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a little kick stand but other than that it it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Fremy Parra

product_meta.title: KODAK Luma 150 Pocket Projector - Portable Movie Projector w/ Built-in Speaker for Home & Office Produces Images Up to 150” for Anywhere Entertainment | HDMI, USB, MicroSD, Airplay & Miracast Enabled
product_meta.description:
Size:150Meet the ultimate in multimedia magic.

 Thanks to the smartphone, you always have incredible imaging at your fingertips. But what happens when you want to share with friends and family? The innovators at KODAK help you look at the big picture with the Luma 150 Portable Projector. This revolutionary device delivers audiovisual excellence with its super bright 150-lumen lamp, 16.7 million display colors.

 Whether you’re watching home movies, the latest blockbuster film, funny YouTube videos or your favorite streaming service, the built-in speaker offers powerful portability. Use the microSD card slot, USB cable, HDMI cable or integrated Airplay and Miracast screen casting to connect to a variety of external devices.

 From the family room to the backyard to the boardroom, it’s a full-size theater that fits in your pocket! So say goodbye to the cramped ‘gather round,’ and wow a crowd by adding the KODAK Luma 150 to your cart today!

 What You Get

 

 * 1 x Luma 150 Portable Projector
   
 * 1 x Full-size HDMI cable
   
 * 1 x USB to Micro-USB cable
   
 * Quickstart guide

 Specs & Details

 

 * Technology: DLP 0.3” EM DMD
   
 * Brightness: 60 Ansi lumen
   
 * Resolution: 854 x 480 [1080p]
   
 * LED life: 3000 hours
   
 * Contrast ratio: 1000:1
   
 * Display colors: 16.7 million
   
 * Offset: 100%
   
 * Throw ratio: 1:2
   
 * Aspect ratio: 16:9
   
 * Focus: manual
   
 * Screen size: 150”
   
 * OS: Linux
   
 * Speaker: 1.5 W
   
 * Battery life: 2.5 hours
   
 * Dimensions: 3.9 x 3.9 x 0.89”
   
 * Weight: 7.75oz
feature_bullets: FROM SMARTPHONE TO THE BIG SCREEN | Pocket Projector Produces Bright, Vivid Video & Imaging Up to 150” for Amazing Home Entertainment; Watch Movies, View Pictures or Give Presentations Anywhere a Wall is Available!

MULTIPLE METHODS FOR VIEWING | Versatile Device Comes w/ HDMI & Micro USB Cables for Hookup to Camera, Storage Drive, PC, Laptop & Other Compatible Devices | Go Wireless w/ Mobile-to-Projector Mirroring Via Airplay & Miracast

STUNNING 16:9 PROJECTION | Device Boasts 60 Ansi lumen brightness LED Lamp, 854 x 480 Resolution, Supports 4K Resolution & 1000:1 Contrast Ratio for Crystal Clear Widescreen Imaging; Watch HD Video, Play 4K Games & Share Family Photographs w/ Brilliant Color & Clarity
DESIGNED FOR EASY PORTABILITY | Includes Built-In Speaker & Sleek Illuminated Onboard Controls So You Can Watch & Listen On Demand| Powers Via Rechargeable Battery Up to 2.5 Hrs.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIMEDIA COMPANION | Tiny Projector Makes a Wonderful Gift Idea for Home, Office or Business | Beyond Entertainment, Use it to Enlarge Images for Staff Meetings, Instructional Seminars, Product Conventions & More Note: Copyrighted content from Hulu, Netflix, and similar services CAN NOT be mirrored or screencast.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars675 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
